post.author: Kiltron
post.body:
Has anyone ever tried using this? How is the quality in the end result?

It looks pretty interesting!

http://hugin.sourceforge.net/

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
yes we have, in related to MS ICE: viewtopic.php?f=8&t=22005

I like hugin. Very nice. I've done some neat things with it & I love how it lets you do everything manually if you want.
